ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I assure you that as of 3 months ago they are fixed now and much much harder than giants.  So much so that we decided they were too hard for their
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
>
> did. As for the sea furies ask somebody who was hunting there early on they
> arte just cyclops with a upgrade in level and hp. They forgot to raise the
> ac and attack rating. That's why when I go after gornit my pet loses a ton
> more hp.

Well, I assure you that as of 3 months ago they are fixed now
and much much harder than giants. So much so that we decided
they were too hard for their /con and not worth the
experience. Gornit was a piece of cake after them.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
